divs: sighting detailswhile driving eastbound saw this red\orange orb in the sse direction, unusual looking as though it did not look like it belonged in the sky. fireworks were in the sky, but object appeared to be away from them. kind of lingering in the sky. as i alternated from driving view to the direction of orb at some point it disappeared.
trends: there has been one other sighting in oak brook\westchester bor
there was one other sighting in oak brook\westchester bor on or around july 4th 2012
Summary: DRIVING EAST BOUND, ON AN OVERPASS SAW RED/ORANGE ORB SSE
